settings.headline: What looks are included in Adventure Everyday?
settings.fcontent: Bright and colorful, Ektar 100 delivers bold, saturated tones with natural looking skin, perfect for candid snapshots.
settings.scontent: Glowing and full of nostalgia, Gold 200 is a golden toned and medium contrast look with low saturation, making it the most versatile preset in this pack.
settings.tcontent: Classic black and white, Tri-X 400 delivers emotive photographs with medium contrast and gorgeous grain.

settings.headline: Mastin Magic Toolkit™: One-click fixes to up your game.
settings.description: Included with your preset pack, our custom tools help you correct the trickiest photos.

settings.scontent: Fix vignetting and distortion, minimize color fringing, and remove chromatic aberration to instantly improve every image.
settings.tcontent: Tired of crooked buildings?Clean up your photosby correcting vertical and horizontal lines.

settings.testimonial: My editing has become more consistent and finally achieve the look I have been trying for! I love Mastin Labs and Fujicolor Original. They've been very helpful!
settings.author: Valorie Lalanne

settings.testimonial: My favorite thing about Mastin is the cohesiveness. I'm now able to get the same look on all my images with minimal effort. I'll never go back to any other editing method!
settings.author: Kaylea Hart

settings.testimonial: I’ve never felt so confident in what I can offer my clients than when using Mastin Labs to edit and hone my work! Thank you guys so much for everything that you do!
settings.author: Cassie Valente

settings.testimonial: I have a clean and colorful edit in just a few clicks. Even better, I can choose between several different tones depending on the mood. Mastin labs presets have become the base to nearly all of my work.
settings.author: Jessie Wade Nelson

settings.testimonial: Mastin Labs presets are the best in the industry! It is so freeing using the presets- my editing workflow speed has improved tremendously and I am able to achieve a consistent film look that I love!
settings.author: Carrie Tompkins

settings.testimonial: My photos no longer look like an amateur took them! Mastin Labs Presets completely changed the end result with very minimal editing skill involved on my part.
settings.author: Jaqui Bartilotta

settings.testimonial: I feel like the Portra Pushed Presets bring life to my images. They intensify the emotion and give images a gorgeous pop, while keeping the skin tones natural looking.
settings.author: Tereza Thomas

settings.testimonial: The Porta Pushed Pack is everything I've been looking for in my editing. I used to spend countless hours tweaking other presets to get this look. It has drastically cut my editing time!
settings.author: Kayla Potter

settings.testimonial: Pushing film gives a whole different look, while still keeping that organic aesthetic. I love that the new Pushed Film presets work so well when I shoot moody, darker photos.
settings.author: Ryan Flynn

settings.testimonial: The Ilford pack is a game changer everybody needs. I thought my black and whites were fine, but I can say that the depth, life, consistency and gorgeous adjustable grain available using this pack has markedly improved my workflow, efficiency and gallery quality. They're invaluable!
settings.author: Ailsa Guest-Smith

settings.testimonial: The Ilford pack is very to the point and delivers fantastic B&W edits in just a few clicks. I love that they offer individual tweaks, i.e. using the red, green, etc. filters. I would surely recommend the pack to any photographers looking for high quality, timeless B&W conversions.
settings.author: Valentin Zwick

settings.testimonial: I don't think I can say enough about my love for the Ilford pack. It was difficult for me to add color photos to my website because I adore what these presets do to my photos so much! The ease of use with Mastin has re-ignited my passion for black and white Photography!
settings.author: Tashana Hayes Klonius

settings.headline: What makes Mastin LUTs different?
settings.content:
We know you’ve been burned by bad LUTs before – the so-called “one-click” miracles that didn’t actually work for your footage, required tons of edits, and left your videos looking dated.

That’s why we set out to do things differently.

Each LUT pack has been meticulously designed and tested to match real film stocks, giving you the same timeless look that filmmakers, film photographers, and high-end clients have loved for decades.

Our Mastin Standard camera-matching system takes all the work out of normalizing footage between different cameras and color profiles, so you can get a consistent film look without spending hours color grading.

Plus, each LUT pack also comes with time-saving editing tools – including white balance correction, orange reduction, and tone profiles – and a step-by-step tutorial video to help you nail your first edit and streamline your workflow for good.

This is more than a LUT – it’s a whole new way to color grade, without the headaches.

Our Mastin Standard camera-matching system takes all the work out of normalizing footage between different cameras and color profiles, so you can get a consistent film look without spending hours color grading.

Plus, each LUT pack also comes with time-saving editing tools – including tone profiles, white balance correction (coming soon), orange reduction (coming soon), – and a step-by-step tutorial video to help you nail your first edit and streamline your workflow for good.

This is more than a LUT – it’s a whole new way to color grade, without the headaches.

settings.headline: Will these work with my current workflow?
settings.content: Absolutely! While we’ve designed our LUTs to make editing fast and easy with the Mastin 3-Step Workflow™, we know you might already have a system that works for you. So, every LUT in your pack will be clearly labeled and ready to incorporate into your existing workflow if that’s what you prefer.

settings.fcontent: Neutral and balanced color with deep contrast, Fuji 160NS+1 is the portrait photographers favored film stock for its natural skin tones across a broad range.
settings.scontent: Light and airy with extra punch, Fuji 400h+1 provides natural skin-tones while maintaining vivid three-dimensional color that pops.
settings.tcontent: Pretty in pink, Fuji 800Z+1 supercharges magenta in the highlights creating a dream-like color scape in your photography.
settings.fourthcontent: With deeper contrast, 160NS+2 is an expansion on Fuji 160NS+1 with magenta color shifts in the highlights.
settings.fifthcontent: With increased contrast and saturation, Fuji 400H+2 is an evolution of Fuji 400H+1.
settings.sixthcontent: Similar to Fuji 800Z+1 but with increased color and contrast, Fuji 800Z+2 is glowing magenta.

settings.headline: Mastin Magic Toolkit™: One-click fixes to up your game.
settings.description: Included with your preset pack, our custom tools help you correct the trickiest photos.
settings.fcontent: Sometimes your camera gets it wrong. Get a starting point for true-to-life color.
settings.scontent: Fix vignetting and distortion, minimize color fringing, and remove chromatic aberration to instantly improve every image.
settings.tcontent: Tired of crooked buildings? Clean up your photos by correcting vertical and horizontal lines.
settings.focontent: A lifesaver for mixed light, extra warm sunsets, and spray tans that just won’t quit.
settings.ficontent: Inspired by the original tone profiles from the Fuji Frontier film scanner, these correct contrast while preserving the look of film.
settings.sicontent: While our presets start grain-free, you can complete your look with 35mm or medium-format grain.

settings.headline: What are Mobile Profiles?
settings.title: Take your look on the go.
settings.content:
With Mobile Profiles, your everyday images can look as beautiful as your professional ones. Optimized for mobile images, our profiles give you the clean, consistent film look you love, from the convenience of your phone.

settings.headline: Presets and Profiles: Should I get both?
settings.title: DESKTOP PRESETS
settings.content: Simply put, presets are for RAW images and profiles are for jpegs. Our Lightroom desktop presets are ideal for simplifying your workflow and creating beautiful and timeless professional images. And with presets, you still have access to everything under the hood, so you can dial in all the details.
settings.scontent: Our Mobile Profiles are the perfect way to edit on your phone, because you get a streamlined, one-click editing experience designed specifically for jpeg file formats. You don’t have access to all the details that you would with a preset, so you can focus on quickly and easily editing beautiful photos and sharing them with the world.

settings.title: Here’s what I know: that passion in your bones is there for a reason.
settings.text:
And that’s why today, my team and I create film-style presets, offer free video education, and gather thousands of like-minded photographers together on Facebook to help you:

make beautiful photos—faster and more easily

build a successful business and life

become the artist you want to be

settings.title: We’re in it for the underdog...
settings.text:
...the one carving out their own version of success, no matter how the world tries to keep them down.

I’m Kirk Mastin, the founder and color scientist behind Mastin Labs.

Whatever you’re going through as a photographer, chances are I’ve lived it—from the long nights of editing to the boss who told me,

“Don’t quit your day job.”

settings.title: We did the work so you don’t have to.
settings.text:
We know you’ve been burned by bad tools before. That’s why we don’t chase trends or churn out presets you’ll have to spend hours tweaking.

Every tool we create is meticulously designed to be subtle, classic, clean, and unbelievably easy—thanks to the Mastin 3-Step Workflow.

So you can finally ditch those editing marathons and focus on serving your clients, building your business, supporting your family, and enjoying your life.

It really can be that simple.

settings.title: What if everyone could have access to the simple beauty of film?
settings.text:
That’s the question we set out to answer almost a decade ago.

And after rigorous testing and endless tinkering with our trusty film scanner, Henri, the first Mastin Labs presets came to life.

We’ve continued innovating since then, but when it comes to creating the most authentic film emulation presets on the market, we’re not trying to do anything new.

We’re working to preserve something that’s already perfect.

settings.testimonial: The everyday pack is really what I've always wanted! I haven't quite aligned with light and airy, and I'm definitely not dark and moody, but bright and colorful. I'm loving seeing my colors the way I imagined them when shooting my images.
settings.author: Alex Baigas

settings.testimonial: I'm pumped to not only have Gold 200 in my arsenal of films, but my all time favorite black and white film, Tri-X 400. I've been waiting for years for this to be released and it was well worth the wait. Kirk and the team have done it again.
settings.author: Kyle Ford

settings.testimonial: The Adventure Everyday Pack is BY FAR my favorite of all the Mastin sets. I have them all and love them all, but this pack makes my heart sing! I've shot Kodak Ektar film (like the real stuff) ...but honestly...it might be better. It's seriously so good!
settings.author: Rachel Ashcraft

settings.testimonial: I have all of the Mastin Labs packs, and this one is my new favorite: it makes my images pop without being over stylized. It works well in both soft backlit scenes and harsh light from the direct sun.
settings.author: Evan Bonde

settings.testimonial: I love BW photography and Acros in Fujicolor Everyday gives me the deep blacks I've been searching for. All three presets are easy to use and make my workflow much faster!
settings.author: Jenna Volden

settings.testimonial: It nails the color palette I’ve always wanted, has vibrancy of color without feeling overdone, and includes my favorite black and white film Acros 100! This pack feels like a love letter just for me.
settings.author: Casey Cosley

Combining footage from multiple cameras and color profiles used to be a pain.

But with the Mastin Standard camera-matching system, you can normalize all your footage for a cohesive and consistent look – without having to do a thing. Because, for the first time ever, normalization is built-in to the luts themselves.

Say goodbye to extra steps. . . and hello to getting consistent looks across all your cameras!

settings.title: What if everyone could have access to the simple beauty of film?
settings.text:
That’s the question we set out to answer almost a decade ago.

And after rigorous testing and endless tinkering with our trusty Fuji Frontier film scanner, Henri, the first Mastin Labs presets came to life.

We’ve continued innovating since then, but when it comes to creating the most authentic film emulation presets on the market, we’re not trying to do anything new.

We’re working to preserve something that’s already perfect.

settings.title: We did the work so you don’t have to.
settings.text:
We know you’ve been burned by bad tools before. That’s why we don’t chase trends or churn out presets you’ll have to spend hours tweaking.

Every tool we create is meticulously designed to be subtle, classic, clean, and unbelievably easy—thanks to the Mastin 3-Step Workflow.

So you can finally ditch those editing marathons and focus on serving your clients, building your business, supporting your family, and enjoying your life.

It really can be that simple.

settings.title: Here’s what I know: that passion in your bones is there for a reason.
settings.text:
And that’s why today, my team and I create film-style presets, offer free video education, and gather thousands of like-minded photographers together in our community to help you:

make beautiful photos—faster and more easily

build a successful business and life

become the artist you want to be

settings.title: You'll be in good company.

settings.headline: FREE GUIDE
settings.title: The Ultimate Guide to  Dark & Moody Photography
Love the light  and airy look?
settings.text:
You’re in good company.
This sophisticated style has inspired fine art photographers, wedding magazines, and
high-end clients for decades.

settings.title: Ready to stand out and capture deeper emotions  in your images?
settings.text:
Then dark and moody photography is for you. This dramatic style has become a go-to for boudoir photographers, as well as those shooting portraits, weddings, engagements, fashion, and food.


By achieving this deep, expressive look – and using it consistently – you’ll be able to set yourself apart and attract clients who love your work.

settings.title: But it’s also one of the toughest styles to get right.
settings.text:
Like many photographers, maybe you’ve found yourself struggling with…

how to find the right light

what to tell your subjects to wear

where to find the right backdrop

what to do with your camera settings

how to edit for a true light and airy look

Getting this look is about so much more
than just throwing on a preset. And in
The Ultimate Guide to Light & Airy Photography, we’ll show you exactly how
to do it so you can create work you love
and build a successful business.

settings.title: But it takes a lot more than just turning down the lights.
settings.text:
And if you’ve ever struggled to achieve the dark and moody look, you’re not alone. Like many photographers, maybe you’ve found yourself wondering how to…

balance light and dark, without losing too much in the shadows

pose your subjects to convey the mood you want — rather than a bunch of blank stares

find the perfect backdrop for your images, whether you’re shooting  indoors or out

dial in your camera settings so you don’t have to spend hours cleaning things up in post

fine-tune your edit for a consistent dark and moody look

Ninety percent of the magic happens the moment you take the photo – and in The Ultimate Guide to Dark & Moody Photography, we’ll show you exactly how to achieve this look so you can thrive as a photographer and build a successful business.

settings.title: WHAT YOU’LL LEARN IN THIS GUIDE
WHAT YOU’LL LEARN IN THIS GUIDE

settings.code:

You don’t need dramatic editing techniques to achieve a dramatic look. We’ll guide you through how to make simple, high-impact adjustments that won’t make your photos feel dated five years from now.

Because we know you’d rather be out taking photos – or just living your life – than be stuck at a computer.

From wardrobe and location to lighting and white balance, discover how to get 90 percent of the way to a perfect image from the moment you take the photo.

With the right preset and a few subtle adjustments, you’ll be delivering photos your clients love in no time.

When you’re not spending hours editing photos, you’ll be free to focus on taking better care of your clients, building your business, and actually enjoying life as a working artist.
